word:
Chapter 39 

     9. Early Impressions Fortified Heart.--The early impressions made upon his [Joseph's] mind garrisoned his heart in the hour of fierce temptation, and led him to exclaim, "How can I do this 
                                                                           1097
great wickedness, and sin against God?" Childhood is the season in which the most abiding impressions may be made. . . .
